page.title: 17All about Braceborough.
page.content: This is a small village with one church.The church is called St. Margarets.There are hardly any cars, only one bus a week and the village is quiet.Most of the 15 houses are big and old with thatched or Collyweston tiled roofs.The people here are friendly.The Post Office is like a house but with a post office added to it.The village has no public house, but it used to have one called the 'Foaming Tankard.It then became an off license and then a private house. The village church is very old and has two services a month.Most people in here work in jobs connected with agriculture.Recently Braceborough House has become a retirement home for 12 elderly people and some of the village women work there.The children go to school by bus and like it when the village is cut off by bad weather.
